Magic Notes:
Caster Level Bonus: +1 base class level for spells known and spells/dy
Enhanced Specialization: Additional opposition school
Intelligence Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level 1
School Specialization (Evocation): Extra Evocation spell/dy each spell level
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Tattoo Focus: +1 DC and caster level vs. resistance w/specialization school spells
Craft Wand: Create wand for up to 4th level spell
Heighten Spell: Increase chosen spell level
School Opposition (Enchantment): Cannot learn or cast Enchantment spells
School Opposition (Illusion): Cannot learn or cast Illusion spells
School Opposition (Transmutation): Cannot learn or cast Transmutation spells
Scribe Scroll: Create scroll of any known spell
Still Spell: Cast spell w/out movement uses +1 spell slot
Notes
Familiar: Rat "Zuzvenluzjam"
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Share Spells; Speak With Master

Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage

Share Spells: Master share self spell w/companion w/in 5'
